law.catch_line: If a unit of the State pays a refund of any tax, fee, charge, penalty, or interest that was distribu...
law.text: If a unit of the State pays a refund of any tax, fee, charge, penalty, or interest that was distributed to a county or municipal corporation, the unit of the State shall deduct the amount refunded from a subsequent distribution of the tax, fee, charge, penalty, or interest to that county or municipal corporation.
